Univar Has Expanded Distribution Agreement with Dow Corning
<!-- -->
{!Contact.FirstName},
You may know that Univar is the largest chemical distributor in North America. We carry hundreds of products for every industry and market, including amines, surfactants, acids, hydrocarbons, inorganics and many more.
But did you know that Univar now carries Dow Corning anti-foamers, defoamers and other silicone products? If you have a silicone need, we have a solution.
To learn more please speak with your Univar Representative or visit our website to a locate your nearest Univar branch. Make sure to ask how you can make the switch to Dow Corning silicones.
